permissions: User must be authenticated and the post creator must be the same as the authenticated user.
side_effects: Creates a post. May enqueue background work to generate short_text_content, generate embeddings, create user_post_feed_posts (for creator and for users who had the subject post in feed), create a post router, and create a creator avatar.
validation_notes: --post-type and --text-content are required. post-type must be one of: basic, notification, action, new_membership, post_summary, post_activity, objective_status, objective_completion, job_production_plan_recap, proffer. status must be one of: draft, published. published-at must be ISO 8601 datetime. creator type must be one of: User, JobProductionPlan, Notification, Objective, KeyResult, PostRouterJob, Broker, Project, Customer, MaterialSupplier, Trucker. Server requires at least one content field (text, image, video, audio, or action_content). text_content length max is 4000 characters by default (can vary by post type). short_text_content length max is 280 characters by default (can vary by post type). subject-post cannot be the same as the post. If creator is a User and subject-post is provided, the subject post must be in the creator's feed. If status is set to published and published-at is blank, the server sets published_at to the current time. For action post_type, action_content must be non-empty and match a valid action schema.

flags.name: --post-type
flags.validation: One of: basic, notification, action, new_membership, post_summary, post_activity, objective_status, objective_completion, job_production_plan_recap, proffer.

flags.name: --creator-type
flags.validation: Must be a valid creator type; server accepts: User, JobProductionPlan, Notification, Objective, KeyResult, PostRouterJob, Broker, Project, Customer, MaterialSupplier, Trucker.
